name: Water Damage Redwood City
tag_list: water-damage-company-redwood-city, water-damage-services-redwood-city-ca, water-restoration-services-redwood-city, water-leaks-redwood-city, water-damage-repair-redwood-city, flood-damage-repair-redwood-city-ca, flood-cleanup-services-redwood-city, mold-r
overview:
Water Damage Company Redwood City Water Damage Redwood City is a leading restoration company providing services for water damage repair, flood damage repair, flood cleanup, mold removal, mold remediation, fire damage repair and smoke damage repair. We offer high quality based solutions to our residential and commercial clients for all their water, flood, mold, fire and smoke restoring needs. Whether you need full-length damage restoration service or you are looking for some elite damage restoration services, you can personalize them as per your requirement.

A few of our regularly used and trusted damage restoration services in California: •24/7 Emergency Damage Restoration •Residential Damage Restoration •Commercial Damage Restoration •Water/Flood Damage Restoration •Water Extraction and Structural Drying •Flooded Basement/Crawl Space Damage Cleanup •Wet Carpet and Upholstery Removal & Restoration •Mold Testing, Removal and Decontamination •Inspections through Thermal Imaging Equipment •Deodorization & Sanitization •Fire and Smoke Damage Cleanup and Restoration •Direct Billing to the Insurance Companies •Paper Work with your Insurance Provider for Claim Settlement

Water Damage Redwood City realizes the urgent need for water damage, flood damage, flood cleanup, mold removal, mold remediation, fire damage and smoke damage. That is why we offer non-stop 24/7 damage restoration services in Redwood City and surrounding areas. We dispatch our technicians at the exact moment you call us and they reach the damaged site within 45 minutes. They will guide you through urgent and basic do’s and do not’s to limit any additional damage at the site.

We are a licensed, insured and bonded damage restoration company who hires only IICRC certified technicians who have a minimum of 8-10 years experience. Our goal is to handle your water, flood, mold, fire and smoke damage to fullest; we handle all the paper work required for your insurance claim settlement and bill your insurance provider directly. Call us immediately if your property has water damage, flood damage, mold damage, fire damage or smoke damage. We’ll provide you with a free estimate and you can compare our company to others.
